bibl.title: The Arab Story of the Destruction of the Ancient Library of Alexandria.
bibl.note: Concludes that the Arab story fabricated in the XIIIth century A.D. is fictitious.

bibl.title: What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria?

bibl.seg: QASSEM ABDOU QASSEM, The Arab Story of the Destruction of the Ancient Library of Alexandria.
Mostafa EL-ABBADI and Omnia Mounir FATHALLAH (Edd.), What Happened to the Ancient Library of Alexandria? = Library of the Written Word. 3. The Manuscript World. 1 (Leiden - Boston, 2008) pp. 207-211.
Concludes that the Arab story fabricated in the XIIIth century A.D. is fictitious.
